response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for both of us. Given its exceptional quality and rarity, the product is worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $900,000. This is a generous offer, tailored to ensure you receive substantial savings while securing an asset of great importance to you. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting this transaction with you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 900000}
